yeasts.description: Apricot with notes of tropical fruit and citrus. Leaves a soft and balanced malt profile with slightly more body than a typical American IPA yeast strain.
yeasts.name: Verdant IPA

equipment.notes: Profile version 2. The BrewZilla Gen 4 is designed to be a compact single vessel, single batch all grain home brewing system
equipment.name: BrewZilla 65L Gen4

hops.notes: A true dual-purpose hops with stone fruit and fig characters and excellent bittering qualities. Unique aromas described as, “the whole orchard.” Dominant stone fruits (especially apricot), tropical fruits, and candy.
hops.name: Rakau
